subject: Soccer
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan and Edson Buddle, who helped the United States reach the second round of the World Cup, were selected to the M.L.S. All-Star game.
snippet: Landon Donovan and Edson Buddle, who helped the United States reach the second round of the World Cup, were selected to the M.L.S. All-Star game.
